channel.title: Pages on Tour de Niu
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Tour de Niu

item.title: About
item.author: tourdeniu@vonneudeck.com (Nicolai von Neudeck)
item.description: Tour de Niu is my personal travel journal. In 2020, between the first two COVID-19 waves in Europe, I bought a used eletric scooter and did a tour through France. I want to share my experiences with my friends, family and the occasional stranger on the internet. Also I want to show a way to do low impact environmentally friendly tourism and encourage others to make their own dream tours. I hope you all enjoy what I post.
